name: Snickers
description: Consisting of nougat topped with caramel and peanuts that has been enrobed in milk chocolate.

name: Milky Way
description: Made of caramel and covered with milk chocolate, similar to the Mars bar sold outside of the U.S.

name: 3 Musketeers
description: Candy bar consisting of chocolate-covered, fluffy, whipped nougat, you wont put down!

name: Laffy Taffy
description: Brand of taffy manufactured by Nestlé and was sold under their Willy Wonka Candy Company brand.

name: Twizzlers
description: Just don’t forget to keep a bag of these chewy, long-lasting treats on hand for movie time!

name: Nerds Rope
description: Chewy and stretchy, this red, tangy taffy, individually wrapped long pieces of taffy are perfect for eating!
